premise_source_doc_sentence: Aleksander Mihailovich Tatarskiy  (  Алекса́ндр Миха́йлович Тата́рский , 11 December 1950 -- 22 July 2007  )  was a Soviet/Russian animation film director , script writer and producer , animator and an artist of Ukrainian Jewish origin .
